name: Ultor
description: When I am equipped, give me the stand ability of an allied stand which was summoned this game.
footer: Please... Don't put me in here... all alone... I'm scared... Why must I be the one to avenge???

name: Chronohacker
description: My wielder can make an additional attack for each point of health that I have. Reduce my health by 1 every time my wielder attacks.
footer: Damn Alice. You really are a beaut! I can't wait to see how many people you save.

name: Imbroglione
description: Whenever my wielder attacks, they damage all enemies. For every enemy defeated, heal the allied world and my wielder by 2. When my wielder dies, replace it with 'Imbroglione Unleashed'.
footer: Jordy... my brother. I give you this, my last gift. I hope you can use it to save the world.

name: McLean Cap
description: When an enemy 'Eye of the Peacock' card is summoned, give it +1 attack and -2 health.
footer: Who ever wears this hat is like a super hero, little bro. So I entrust its power to you!

name: Hat of Chaos
description: Round End: Cast a random spell
footer: I wonder why that cat wheres that black top hat...
